name: Raknar
description:
"If you like old-school platformers, you will love Raknar"

Charming 8-bit graphics. Jump, run, fight enemies and solve amazing puzzles.

Help our viking hero to find the runes and treasures into the dangerous caves.

This game is a premium product that can be fully played without In-App Purchases. All purchase offers are completely optional and may help you beating the game.
